[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@formidable-webview/webshell](./webshell.md) &gt; [handleElementCSSBoxFeature](./webshell.handleelementcssboxfeature.md)

## handleElementCSSBoxFeature variable

This feature enables receiving the CSS Box dimensions of an element identified by `tagName` in the `WebView` pixels unit. The first element matching the provided tagName is retained. A new event will be triggered on every resize.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleElementCSSBoxFeature: EventFeatureOf<HandleElementCSSBoxDimensionsOptions, 'onDOMElementCSSBoxDimensions', ElementCSSBoxDimensions>
```
